metadata.name: File Download Via Bitsadmin To An Uncommon Target Folder
metadata.comment: Detects usage of bitsadmin downloading a file to uncommon target folder

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\bitsadmin.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('bitsadmin.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /transfer ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /create ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /addfile '))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%appdata%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%temp%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%tmp%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\appdata\\local\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c:\\windows\\temp\\'))))

output.summary: Detects usage of bitsadmin downloading a file to uncommon target folder

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.cmd_line, process.parent_process.cmd_line False positive: Unknown References: https://blog.netspi.com/15-ways-to-download-a-file/#bitsadmin, https://isc.sans.edu/diary/22264, https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Bitsadmin/, https://blog.talosintelligence.com/breaking-the-silence-recent-truebot-activity/
